Package modelServer.DAO.implementation

Class MeetingDAO

java.lang.Object
modelServer.DAO.implementation.MeetingDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMeetingDAO
public class MeetingDAO extends Object implements IMeetingDAO
DAO Class accessing the database through an instance of the DBConnection class MeetingDAO works with the operations connected to the relations between Trainee and Coach objects
